meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Theon Banos Cross Marty Gertsman Meg Shreve Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #658.

td.p: Theon Banos Cross, a writer & educator originally from Boston, Massachusetts
Marty Gertsman, a retail manager originally from Brooklyn, New York
Meg Shreve, an attorney from Bolinas, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $29,799)

tr.td: GUNS
TV TRIVIA
DINING OUT
EXPLORERS
STAMPS & COINS
ATMOSPHERIC SONGS
